SEARCH
Module photos

Package controller

package controller
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AddCaptionsTagsController
    Controller class for handling the addition and update of captions and tags for a photo.
    AdminSystemController
    The AdminSystemController class controls the admin system interface, allowing the administrator to create new users, delete existing users, logout, and quit the application.
    AllPhotosController
    The AllPhotosController class controls the user interface for viewing all photos in an album in a grid view.
    CopyPhotoController
    The CopyPhotoController class controls the user interface for copying a photo to another album.
    CreateAlbumController
    The CreateAlbumController class controls the user interface for creating a new album.
    CreateNewUserController
    The CreateNewUserController class controls the user interface for creating a new user.
    EditAlbumController
    The EditAlbumController class controls the editing of an album.
    LoginController
    The LoginController class controls the user interface for the login functionality.
    MainAppWindowController
    The MainAppWindowController class controls the main application window.
    MovePhotoController
    The MovePhotoController class controls the user interface for moving a photo to another album.
    RenameAlbumController
    The RenameAlbumController class controls the user interface for renaming an album.
    SearchByDateController
    The SearchByDateController class controls the user interface for searching photos by date.
    SearchByTagsController
    The SearchByTagsController class controls the user interface for searching photos by tags.
    SearchResultsController
    The SearchResultsController class controls the user interface for displaying search results.
